backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with authorization checks and storing contact form messages, including admin-only message retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the content editing guide to relevant components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and components.
frontend/CONTENT_EDITING_GUIDE.md: Developer guide explaining how to edit site text, images, menu items, and configuration-based content.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH variables for light and dark mode UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all main pages wrapped in the site layout.
frontend/src/components/about/StorySecti: Renders the About page story content with styled sections and a closing quote.
frontend/src/components/boosters/ComboBa: Config‑controlled dismissible promo banner linking to an offer.
frontend/src/components/boosters/EmbedsS: Optional Instagram and Google Reviews embed section driven by boostersConfig toggles.
frontend/src/components/boosters/Student: Shows a student discount badge when enabled in boostersConfig.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Form that submits contact messages via canister mutation with validation and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Responsive grid displaying café gallery images with hover zoom and soft shadows.
frontend/src/components/home/AtmosphereM: Displays a 3‑image masonry-style gallery with captions and styling.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero with background image, tagline, description, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/LocationHou: Shows an embedded map plus address, hours, and a directions button.
frontend/src/components/home/SignatureDi: Shows a grid of featured dishes with images, taglines, and a link to the full menu.
frontend/src/components/home/SocialProof: Displays a star-rating strip with short customer review quotes.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Implements a testimonial carousel with navigation and author attribution.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyPeopleLo: Lists four highlighted reasons to visit, each with an icon and description.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, contact info, social links, hours, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the page with a sticky header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/StickyHea: Provides a responsive header with logo, navigation links, CTAs, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuCategor: Displays a menu category with title, optional description, and a grid of item cards.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemCar: Renders a styled card showing a menu item's image, badges, name, price, and description.
frontend/src/config/boostersConfig.ts: Defines configuration for promotional boosters like combo banners, student discounts, and embeds.
frontend/src/config/siteConfig.ts: Holds site-wide metadata including name, contact info, social links, hours, and location settings.
frontend/src/data/menuData.ts: Provides menu category and item definitions with details like descriptions, prices, images, and badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, updating it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a mutation for creating contact messages using the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, color variables, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page layout with a title and the StorySection component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows a contact form, contact details, quick action buttons, and an embedded map.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery page with a header and the GalleryGrid component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage layout by rendering a sequence of promotional and content sections including hero, social proof, dishes, testimonials, and location info.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Renders the menu page with a header, student discount badge, and a list of menu categories sourced from menuData.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, store, persist, and clear URL or session-based parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including colors, typography, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, architecture notes, and existing feature specifications for the luxury cafe website.
